name: Supply and Demand Simulator
description:
This simulation was inspired by Simulating Supply and Demand by Primer. It has buyers and sellers in a single-good economy.

Source code is available at Github:  https://github.com/Maaack/Supply-and-Demand-Simulator 

Feel free to leave comments and feedback!

Question for Testers:

  • Windows build working?
  • Mac OSX build working?
  • Any screen resolution issues?
